formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of an existing EC-Chef plugin configuration which holds all the information required to connect to a Chef server.

formElement.label: Chef-client Path:
formElement.documentation: Path to the chef-client executable. E.g., /usr/bin/chef-client (This is the default value). (Required)

formElement.label: Run as a user with full system privileges:
formElement.documentation: Enabled by default to allow chef-client to run as a user with elevated privileges (e.g., using sudo on *nix systems).

formElement.label: Node Name:
formElement.documentation: Unique name for the node that will be maintained by the chef-client. If left blank, Chef will use the Fully Qualified Domain Name of the node as the node name.

formElement.label: Additional Arguments:
formElement.documentation: Any additional arguments that need to be passed to the chef-client
